name: Color Splash (itch) (ToNhiHoang)
description:
Description

You are a slime and an artist. Enamored by your surroundings, you wanted to capture its beauty with abstract, grid-like paintings. Using the pool of paints on your canvas, replicate the scenery by coating yourself in paint and move around!

We aimed to be colorblind friendly with this painting puzzle game!  Please notify us if you have trouble seeing or the colors aren't visibly different enough!

Color Splash is a game (prototype) made within 2 weeks for a course.

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys - Move

R - Retry level

When you reach the win screen, press R to return to the title screen!

Credits

Product Owner & Level Designer - To Nhi Hoang
Programmer - Wiktor Åström
Graphic and music artist - Mohammed Diab
Scrum Master - Brian Barikahn
